attributes.action: Carry on in the job and show full support to him unlike some of his party
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I just want to show my support for Gordan Brown as PM and hope he continues on as pm. I feel those who have left the cabinet have not done so for the good of Labour or the good of the country but for there own self interest. The Prime Minister is not the sole person to blame for the world wide recession and in my eyes he is the right man to sort our economy out. Lets hope that there are more willing memebers with the passion to confront problems rather then wlak away like Mr Purnell.
